rewind 0.7.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

bin2dec_vec()

convert binary codes to decimal integers

compute_product_Bern_table()

Compute the product Bernoulli probability table

cuthill_mckee()

Cuthill McKee (CM) algorithm

distAB()

Frobenius norm: ||AA'-BB'||_F

do_update_Q_one()

Update the current element of Q_ml or not

equal_unit_vec()

check whether a vector is equal to a unit vector with the one at a particular position

eval_string()

create a string with parts that need to be replaced by a variable's actual values

f()

flip the matrix to the right form for image()

fix_cluster()

adjust cluster ids by specification

get_freq()

Get frequency count for each integer

log_f_logden()

compute the log of density of inactive states' probability given the previous one (Teh et al., 07')

log_f_logprima()

compute the derivative of the log of density of inactive states' probability given the previous one (Teh et al., 07')

log_full()

Function to compute the full cluster-specific likelihood given latent variables

log_marginal()

R Function to compute the cluster-specific marginal likelihood

log_marginal_Q_identity()

R Function to compute the cluster-specific marginal likelihood (just for Q=I)

log_pr_Qml_cond()

Compute the full conditional probability of Q_ml given the rest of parameters

log_pr_Qml_cond_enum()

Compute the full conditional probability of column Q_l given other unknown parameters

mblock()

obtain the indices of rows of Q that form orthogonal blocks

merge_H_Q()

Merge latent state profile matrix (H_star) and Q matrix

merge_H_col()

Merge redundant H_star by column

merge_Q()

merge Q matrix by rows

merge_map()

Merge mapping

metrop_flip()

Metroplis flipping to improve mixing

mfm_coefficients()

computing coefficients for mixture of finite mixture model

order_mat_byrow()

Order a binary matrix by row

ordered_insert()

insert a cluster ID prior to "index"; mylist keeps a list of cluster IDs

ordered_next()

Find the next available cluster ID to use:

ordered_remove()

remove an index from a vector of cluster ID

plot_individual_pred()

Plot individual probabilities

plot_population_fractions()

Plot population "etiology" fractions (for known Q only)

plot_rewind()

Plot data, design matrix or co-clustering probabilities

plot_truth()

Plot truth for simulation studies

postprocess_H_Q()

Merge H and Q

restricted_gibbs()

Restricted Gibbs scan to update assignment indicators in S.

rewind

rewind: Rconstructing Etiology with Binary Decomposition

sampler()

Main function for model estimation

scatterhist()

Plot posterior sampling chain and the histogram on the right margin

simulate_Q()

Randomly generate a Q matrix within the identifying conditions

simulate_Q_dat()

Randomly generate a Q matrix within the identifying condition (data-driven)

simulate_data()

simulate data from restricted latent class models

split_merge()

Split-merge type update of clusterings

summarize_latent_state_given_Q()

Summarize individual latent state patterns given Q

trunc_rbeta()

Sample truncated Beta random variables

update_Q()

update the Q matrix element-wise

update_Q_col_block()

Block update the Q matrix by column

update_alpha()

sample alpha - hyperparameter for latent state prevalences p_m

update_mu_PR()

sample a_theta_one - hyperparameter (mean) for positive rates theta_l, psi_l

update_positive_rate()

update true and false positive rates

update_prevalence()

update latent state prevalences

update_pseudo_n_PR()

sample alpha_s - hyperparameter for positive rates theta_l, psi_l

z2comat()

Compute the posterior co-clustering probability matrix (probability that i and j are clustered together).
